text: "People know about you, miss, but I don't care, I'm not bein" doon in the knee again! #Thud

passages.full_quote: "I think I <used>know about you, miss, but I don't care</used> who you are, you see"

passages.fragment: , but I do n't care , I 'm not
passages.full_quote: I've got the Douglas Adams Markov bot online, <used>but I don't care, I'm not</used> going to think about it, didn't I
